name: Merge Barista: Café Decoration
description:
NEW UPDATE EVERY TWO WEEKS!

Are you ready to design your dream coffee shop? A brand new merge game

Discover numerous items. Meet with interesting customers. Fulfill orders to earn coins. Use your coins to design your coffee shop however you want.

Merge to create highest level items. Never ending merging experience on an amazing board.

Unlock new rooms and expand your coffee shop!
publishers: ZERO SUM TEKNOLOJI YAZILIM VE PAZARLAMA ANONIM SIRKETI
